column3: Upcoming Closure Scheduled for Intersection of Cooper Dr at University Dr for Major Utility Work:
column4: Friday February 7 at 9 a.m. thru Monday February 10 at 6 a.m.

column3: Upcoming Closure Scheduled for Intersection of Cooper Dr at University Dr for Major Utility Work:
column4: The traffic patterns in effect during this time will be as follows:

column3: Upcoming Closure Scheduled for Intersection of Cooper Dr at University Dr for Major Utility Work:
column4: Traffic on University Dr will be able to go through the intersection or turn right onto Cooper Dr, but may not turn left onto Cooper Dr.

column3: Upcoming Closure Scheduled for Intersection of Cooper Dr at University Dr for Major Utility Work:
column4: Traffic on Cooper Dr approaching University Dr from either direction MUST turn right onto University Dr.

column3: Upcoming Closure Scheduled for Intersection of Cooper Dr at University Dr for Major Utility Work:
column4: Please see the diagram to view the traffic pattern. Detours will be in place.
